From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>


Ice approached Kluster and extended a paw-like hand covered in Fur. "Perhaps
you could give me some help, I was wondering what the wars been like since
I've been gone." She stammered with the words after she'd said them, she
wanted so much to stand up and shout that she'd returned from the dead. "I
mean since I was detained here." She tried to correct herself but she wasn't
very good at lieing, or covering up her fealings. She had to play the game
like a politician trying to get elected (No I don't mean order a recount,
throw out votes, and stand before the Supreme court.) She had to set a
routine that would get her on thier good side, and follow through once thier
trust was gained. (Even if it means kissing hands and shaking babies.)
